name: Thunder-Clap
description:
When any creature within range of you prepares to strike another, you may punctuate their attack with a burst of sound. Adding 1d6 thunder damage to their attack should it hit. If the attack misses the extra damage is lost, and your action points are still spent. 

The damage this spell inflicts increases by 1d6 when you reach 5th level (2d6), 11th level (3d6), and 17th level (4d6).
